meanings.definition: The act of classifying something again.
meanings.sent1: The reclassifications of the books in the library made it easier to find them.
meanings.sent2: The reclassifications of the documents were necessary for better organization.
meanings.sent3: The reclassifications of the toys in the playroom led to a fun game of hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her reclassifications of the plants in the garden brought new life to the backyard.
meanings.sent5: The reclassifications of the stars in the sky made stargazing more enjoyable.

meanings.definition: The process of assigning a new classification to something.
meanings.sent1: The reclassifications of the products in the store improved sales.
meanings.sent2: The reclassifications of the files helped streamline the workflow.
meanings.sent3: The reclassifications of the animals at the zoo caused quite a stir among visitors.
meanings.sent4: His reclassifications of the colors in the painting created a whole new masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The reclassifications of the planets in the solar system fascinated astronomers.
